resources.string: Bachelor\'s Program in Informatics - Faculty of Science and Technology - Sunan Kalijaga State Islamic University
Hi, my name\'s Agus. I\'m the operator for the Target Shooter game at this night carnival. This game really grabs the attention of the visitors here.
You seem unsure about which game to play. Is this your first time here? Maybe you could try the Target Shooter game first. I\'m sure you\'ll like it.
This game is pretty easy. You just need to hit the targets you see. They will pop up and disappear repeatedly. Just stay focused to hit them.

We\'ve got two game modes here: Easy and Hard. In Easy mode, you just hit the targets as I mentioned. But in Hard mode, be careful because the targets move faster and there are bombs that can reduce your points. Remember, each target hit gives you one point, but hitting a bomb will cost you two points. So, watch out and have fun!
Oh, so you want to play in Easy mode?
This mode is super easy, even beginners can play it effortlessly. But I think you\'re more than just a beginner. Maybe you can try the Hard mode later.
Alright, if you still want to play Easy mode, let me remind you that you just need to hit the targets that pop up. They will appear and disappear repeatedly. Stay focused to hit them.
Alright then, go ahead and play. Don\'t forget to have fun because there\'s no point in playing if it\'s not enjoyable. Enjoy the game!
Wow, looks like you\'re brave enough to try Hard mode!
This mode is pretty challenging for beginners. But I believe you\'re more than just a beginner. Are you sure you want to take on this challenge?

Alright, I respect your courage. Many visitors get challenged by this mode, but they often struggle with it. Let me remind you once more, in this mode, you need to be careful because the targets move faster, and there are bombs that can decrease your points.
Alright then, show me that you can handle it. But don\'t forget that this is just a game. So, make sure you enjoy it. Have fun!
